about_the_game:
NanoDeath is a roguelike-y 2D game that focuses on melee combat, quick movements and heavy synergy building while listening to 8-bit metal music. You play as a nano-tech pathogen designed to obliterate a human's body from within. However, your infiltration abilities aren't the only thing that's revolutionized. Explore nano-infused organs with enhanced immuno defense mechanisms, ranging from steel-clad white cells to bacteria killing machines.

The game features many abilities with synergistic properties along with a heavy focus on melee combat.
